package.name: FingerLock.
package.shortDescription: Add awesome features to your lock screen.

descriptionlist.description: FingerLock - add awesome features to your lock screen • Customizable unlock button Long press or press to unlock Change X and Y position buttons 4 tactile feedback options when unlocking Full color customization • Skip password screen after respring • Hide lock screen dots • Hide text "Press home to unlock" or "Swipe up to unlock" Custom images button
